contentrichtext.text: '''Jasper County''' is the name of eight counties in the United States of America. All are named in honor of Sergeant [[William Jasper]], a hero of the Revolutionary War: <br /> '''Bold Name''' indicates county sharing boundary with a [[Newton County (disambiguation)|Newton County]]. Five states have paired their two counties because of their namesake's common history. * '''[[Jasper County, Georgia]]''' * [[Jasper County, Illinois]] * '''[[Jasper County, Indiana]]''' * [[Jasper County, Iowa]] * '''[[Jasper County, Mississippi]]''' * '''[[Jasper County, Missouri]]''' * [[Jasper County, South Carolina]] * '''[[Jasper County, Texas]]''' == Other == * [[Jasper County (album)|''Jasper County'' (album)]]: a recording by Trisha Yearwood <!-- Templates --> {{disambiguation|uscounty}} <!-- Categories -->
